content.detailedDescription: I was driving home last night from my friends house in millington so i took m15 home because i live in saginaw so was passing almost to saginaw just before the airport  and and i saw an object in air with a red and green light. i thought nothing of it thinking it was a plane it then suddenly changed paths dropping into a u pattern then just shot off and dissapeared. i just was astonished my mouth dropped i still cant believe what i saw! i just wish i could have got a picture but it happened so fast!
content.summary: I saw flying sacuer like thing that was going in a path thought it was a plane then just with ridiclious speed changed directions.

content.detailedDescription:
I told my daughter about this and she sent me the email address of mr. george filer.  he asked if i would fill out a mufon form and sent me the link. i did not get around to it until now.  below, is the body of the email i wrote to mr. filer on july 8, 2011. i added some additional comments that my wife made, at the very bottom.

at around 10 pm on the 4th of july my wife and i were heading south on rt47
in cape may county nj between goshen and indian trail rd (rt147). i noticed
and orange glowing ball in the sky off to north west of us and at first
thought it to be fireworks. i watched for a short while realized it wasn't
bursting or falling to the ground. i pointed it out to my wife and as i got
closer i lost site of it but my wife could still see it out of her side
window. she opened the window and told me stop the car that i had to in her
words "see this thing". i pulled onto the shoulder and we both got out as
the object passed over our car going from west to east i could clearly see
a round object. it was bright orange. in it's center there appeared to be
something like a brilliant reddish orange flame or burner and around the
perimeter were orange dots. the whole object was bright orange. there was
a moderate but steady flow of traffic heading in both directions so i
thought for sure other cars would stop but none did. the object made no
noise and kept traveling east until it was out of sight. as it went away
form us it looked more like an orange ball again. i took a picture with my
blackberry camera but it came out looking like a small dot in the sky. i
believe it was overcast that evening as i don't recall seeing any stars.
i have tried to rationalize what i saw, thinking it was some kind of 4th of
july display or possibly the bottom of a balloon gondola with a 4th of july
display under it but nothing made sense. i have never seen anything like it
in my life and neither has my wife. 

i'm just surprised that i have not heard anything about anyone else seeing
it. the way it traveled out of sight it was heading for wildwood on one of
the busiest nights of the year. maybe you folks have received some
reports, i just can't believe we were the only ones to see this. the whole
episode lasted maybe 3 minutes. i can't say how large it was or how fast
it was going. if you held bottle cap over your head and looked up at it,
that's about size it looked up in the sky but with the details i describe looking straight up under it were very clear.


ps my wife says the object appeared larger than a bottle cap, closer to the size of a basket ball and hovered directly overhead for about 30 seconds before moving east. i agree with her that it did seem to stop directly overhead and sit there for a short time.  i don't know what this thing was, i have never been a fan of ufo's. i have never seen anything like this in my life and neither has my wife.  we went home thinking wow, that's all i can say.  i tried rationalizing that it was some sort observation balloon launched for 4th of july celebrations but, i have seen balloons before, this was not like any ballon i ever saw.  it resembled a round platform or disc from benieth. i took a picture of it with my cell phone when it was moving away from us but it turned out looking like a small dot in the black sky. every time i drive over that stretch of road now i picture that thing in my mind and wonder if i will ever see anything like it again.  it definitely changed my view of ufo's.
content.summary: Saw bright yellow/orange ball in south western sky, as car close with this ball we got out, it hovered over the car underside was bright orange with redish orange pulsing center, surounded by round orange dots, then it headed east and out of view.
content.locationName: Town of Goshen NJ, New Jersey

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were heading from finishing up our errands for the day. when we had gone past yorba linda boulevard and hit the side of the freeway where it's mostly mountains and trees. i was looking out the window, not really looking at anything in particular. that was when i first noticed a white object in the sky that was right above the mountains. at first i just thought it was just a small or large airplane since we were getting closer corona municipal airport. i ignored it until i saw a regular sized plane pass right below it. making me realized the size difference was immense, and that it wasn't moving. looking at it closely i saw it was a white disc shaped object. i started watching it closely for a while after that. i tried to point it out to my mom except she was driving so she couldn't see it. i was able to tell her what was happening though. another plane passed after a few minutes later but this time except it was a small personal plane (not a jet.) the object it the sky was still slightly smaller than it. when we got close to green river or a little before. the object had been in the middle of the window when i first saw it, but since we had been continuously moving it was now on the far left. i was getting worried i was about to loose sight of it when suddenly i noticed it slowly began to hover in a strait line to the right before it began to move downwards. right before it made it midway before it seemed to disappear just like that. after it disappeared a few more planes passed by per usual. didn't notice any helicopters but i didn't really check.
content.summary: Saw a white disc in the sky. it was stationary for a few minutes before it began moving.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work, i work at a local car dealership and it was about 630 pm on 10/29/2011 i was outside having a cig when out of the corner of my eye i noticed a decent sized orange glow heading toward the south west. i was exactly the color of mars but much larger about the size of a aspirin pill. now i have lived next to o'hare airport all of my life, so seeing air planes and helicopters is an every day thing for me. as i first glanced at it i thought nothing of it, besides is odd color being that it might be an air plane. i looked back again a few moments later, and noticed that the object had a very low rate of speed. (lower than any plane i have seen travel or helicopter). after watching the object for several min, it has a very odd flight patter seeming to almost be traveling diagonally, and as it came closer to me it started pausing in the sky for a few min then continue its slow rate of speed to the southwest. when the object came closer to me i noticed it was flickering, kinda like if you were to stare at a star and see the atmospheric disturbance. witch lead me to believe this really might be a ufo, cause in order for it to have that flickering it would haft to be beyond our atmosphere. the object stopped once again so i went to go inside and grab my cell phone to see if i could record this object. so when i came back outside and the object was still there but had gotten a little bit dimmer, then as i tried to record the object it was pretty dim so my cell phone could not pick it up, so i just stood there and watched, and slowly started to just fade away, as though it was traveling away from us, and a few moments later the object was gone. i know what i saw, as i've said before i live next to the busiest airport in the world and i'm a persistent sky watcher, always looking at the night sky, this was nothing i have ever seen before. i also did scan the skies for other airplanes for a reference, which  i did see sevral of them and they did not at all share any characteristics of the
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange colored orb traveling slow, with odd pauses and no sense of direction above western suburbs of chiago

content.detailedDescription: I was going from my back door to my car to leave for work. it was about 6:00 am, and i paused, as i normally do every morning, to gaze at the stars, which were quite beautiful this morning. as i looked toward my car, which would be looking west, i noticed two stars above the tree line. as i looked at them i noticed that they were moving due north. for a moment i thought that their movement was an optical illusion, but then i saw that they were drawing nearer to the tree line. as they neared the trees i moved into my driveway to see them better. they were positioned one on top of the other, forming an invisible diagonal line. if you close one eye and hold two fingers out in front of you roughly five inches apart, that's how far apart they were from each other. i then noticed that the two "stars" were traveling at exactly the same speed and distance, never breaking stride from one another. i watched them until they disappeared from view behind the trees. i was very intrigued and curious about the lights, and wished i could've watched them longer. i don't know what they were, weather alien in nature, satellites, or whatever. i've seen airplanes all my life, and these things were not airplanes. no landing, wing or tail lights, and absolutely no sound at all. in my mind they were either independently piloted craft, traveling flawlessly together, or lights on some larger craft. i don't know.
content.summary: Two star-like objects seen traveling in unison.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house(mother and father's) and i decided to go outside on my deck none of my family members were outside and the houses that i was between no one was outside and when i looked in the woods far from my house,all of a suden,i saw a litte or medium size dome in the woods it looked like it was metallic and i decided to go back into my house and i got my binoculars and looked at the woods and it was a ufo and right at the corner of my binoculars,i saw a human-like alien,instead it had a big head like mine.And it seemed that those 3 aliens were smart because it looked like they cushion shoes on and also on their spacecraft's legs and the thing that they were doing(the aliens were grey)was they had a laser and was using it to cut something and that alien picked up what appeared to look like was a heart.I wanted to go over there to investigate to find the body but they took the body with them and the heart and the animal or human looked like it was already dead.When they were done they got back into their ship and lifted 50ft into the air and it looked like it was coming towards me,so i got back into my house but it passed me and i got outside again and i saw the object it was large and the sound was weird.When i saw it,the top(before it took off)it was grey,the whole ship was grey it's lights went on and they were red and it had windows and when i looked into them there wasn't just 3 aliens,there was 5 aliens.It was a disk but instead it looked like a deep dish pizza with a dome over it and another dome(it was small)and i looked into the top dome,an alien was flying the ship and looked at me and when i looked back at the landing point with the binos(binoculars)i saw nothing and the ship disintigrated with tiny bits and i think it had some kind of transporter.I was stund this was my first ufo sighting i'm just glad i didn't get abducted.
content.summary: It landed somewhere far from my house in the woods

content.detailedDescription:
Wating for the bus
looking for big dipper
ufo
blinking
just plain terrified.
it teleported
content.summary: Terrifying

content.detailedDescription:
Here are my notes from the sighting.
11-01-2011
8:52 pm
east to west flight
first saw just below deneb at about 50*
���traveling between deneb and gienah cygni���
very dim lights. mostly noticed a dark shadow of a chevron shape or wide triangle.���
object looked to only be a couple thousand feet up. it was larger than the cesmas that fly over at a few hundred feet as they head in to land at the small airport north-east of me.���
in my years of experience of watching flight patterns around my home, i have never seen anything take the path that the object did. i have also never seen a plane or helicopter with such dim lights. there was no flashing strobe at all. even when planes pass over at very high altitude i can easily see the regular faa required lights. what i saw last night looked like a huge bird at first due to lack of lights. my best view of it was as it passed from about 50* to 40*. i could see that it was not a bird. it was barely visible due to it being so dark colored. i have watched quite a few very large bids fly over late at night and it looked similar at first in the way that the light pollution illuminated the underside. if i had not been looking at those two stars right at that moment we would never of known it flew past us, that's how well it was camouflaged.������the object was obviously a craft of unknown type to me. it reminded me somewhat of the tr3b ���but more like a boomerang. it was quite large. it was very quiet. my husband and i thought we heard a very soft white noise, but we live close to a freeway and it was hard to tell. given that it flew from the east to west, if it was any type of conventional jet we should of easily heard it as it flew overhead and away from us. ���
when i spotted the object and asked my husband, "what is that?!", a he confirmed seeing it, i turned and grabbed my binoculars from a few feet behind us. my husband was fixed on the object so i handed him the lenses. he states that it had very dim lights on it. one in front, then two set back slightly and two on either end point of a different color than the first 3. when i first saw the object the shape was easier to see due to the light cast by city lights. i could not see any protrusion at the back end. my husband did not see the shape of the craft as well as i did and he was unable to determine the body shape of it. he argues that it was possibly a dark colored ���executive jet. he bases this only on the lighting positions. i will attach a drawling of the light positions. i felt that it may of been a military craft. the airbase is to our south-west and it was at least heading west. my husband has some sort of explanation for everything, but i know a lot more about the sky around us and the objects in it. my whole life i have loved and learned about stars, satellites, planes, clouds and birds and such. ���so in my experiences, i have never seen this type of object in the sky. ���one other thing, my husband has seen the stealth bomber fly very low overhead when he lived near moffit airbase and he did not recognize this object as being the same.���
the link to include pictures is not active? i can't attach them.
content.summary: Dark quiet boomerang or wide triangle with no flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: Walking dog saw a light coming at me.  dark out.  the light i thought was a plane light. i stopped to watch it, and listen for plane engine.  it got to the point of being in front of me at about 100-150 feet and the light did not break off me like a plane beam would at a certain point.  and heard no noise at all.  watched the object go past my location and the light beam was just as strong as i first saw it.  no noise.  it went up the river and i watched it until it was out of sight. i went thru a list in my head trying to check off what it could be.  the only rational explanation i could come up with was a mylar balloon with continual light reflecting off it . it was traveling at about 35-40 miles an hour.  i looked around and noticed that the wind was blowing at about 15 miles an hour against the objects direction.  i have no idea what it was at this point.  a little weird.  thought i would let you know. you track these things i believe.
content.summary: Object came in my direction while walking dog.  waited for the light or plane sound to happen .It did not and flew past me .

content.detailedDescription: It was october 4, 2011 at approximately 8:00 pm.  i was coming out of a friends home, when i noticed children in the parking lot screaming and pointing to the north sky.  when i looked i thought it was an elaborate big blimp that was hovering by the third floor on the northeast side of the building.  i begin to yell to my friend for him to come and witness the object that was hovering in fornt of his childrens bedroom window.  i immediately ran to my car and continued to yell for my friend to come out.  as i grabbed my phone i turned towards the object and playfully yelled, "take me, take me!"  it started rotating as if to position for a directional take-off.  it went northeast approximately 5-10 mi radius as it was coming back towards me in what appeared to be a 360 degree turn i began to photograph with my camera phone.  at this point my friend came outside and i asked him if it was a jet that i was seeing since he was almost level eye to eye with the object.  this is when i began to climb on a green meter box and switched my phone from photo to video because i noticed there was no sound coming from it and the way it hovered, i just had to get it on film because it has audio.  my friend yelled to his wife to go get their camera while i continued to film.  then it gave off an intimidating sound; turned slowly to the north; within seconds it was gone headed northward and out of sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was hugemongeous and very slient in addition it made a disturbing noise that was deafening to the ears.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,
i was driving on a local road here near middle smithfield, pa saturday october 29 around 7pm with my father. we saw a pale pink pulsating light that appeared in front of my truck and illuminated everything including the ground. the light seemed to lasted like 2 seconds then everything went dark again. about 5 seconds later  the same light came again and lasted another 2 seconds. then for the third time after 5 seconds it happened again. we didnt stop the truck but it was very weird what we experienced. i take that road many times during night time and never seen anything like this before. the light illuminated everything from trees, road, houses, etc. and i was doing 35 mile per hour.
 george
content.summary: Pink light appear illuminated everything including ground lasted 2 seconds. then it happened 2 more times after 5 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:45 am 11/1/2011 i looked in the direction of the constellation of orion. i witnessed a flash of light, more like a reflection that you would see when you witness solar panels from a satellite reflecting sunlight. the object looked like space debris reflecting the soon rising sun,but what had me puzzled was that the object seemed to stay in the same area so i observed more and located the nearest star. after locating the region of sky in a star map of orion it seems in the same area i witnessed the object there is a variable star, but variable stars change magnitude over a period of a few days not minutes! i have witnessed plenty of satellites,iss,hubble,shuttles passing overhead in my life but they always seemed to move across the sky somewhat quickly. this object seemed stationary at first and flashed about 20-30 times and very slowly moved and then got dimmer and dimmer over a period of ten minutes. i think this sighting may just be space debris, but what has me puzzled is all other space debris i have witnessed seemed to move across the sky very fast compared to the object i was seeing. i have included a star map of the orion region and highlighted the objects position and direction of movement. please explain if i witnessed space debris,satellite,pulsar,quasar ,variable star, double star,super nova, or ufo. thank you 



  (name moved to fi box) cms 11/02/11 14:31 cst flg
content.summary: At 5:45 am on 11/2/2011 i looked in the direction of orion and witnessed a flash then continued to see more flashes.

content.detailedDescription: I watched in awe as a bright light traveled across the sky, it was the brightest thing next to the moon, it was silent, it was fast, it didn't blink it traveled approximately west north west to east south east, i said to my 3 year old son, "wow do you see that ufo ?" and he said, "dad, come-on man, really ? you that stupid ? that's just the international space station".
content.summary: Bright light moving in sky that was not a plan or star, but ..

content.detailedDescription: I had walked out on the porch when my ex dropped off my son.  i was making conversation as he hooked up my sons car seat and happened to look up at the moon.  there was a bright light that i can only compare to the northern star that seemed like it was falling to the left of the moon.  the more i watched it the more i realized that it was not a star nor an airlplane.  it moved fast and was not falling it was traveling southeast. it faded into a pin point withing a matter of 10-20 seconds.  there was no sound.  no blinking.  no pattern of movement.  this light was traveling fast and steady.  i yelled at my sons father to look up over and over but by the time he looked up (after securing carseat) the light was already a pin point but still traveling.  he also witnessed it but did not see the brightness that i did.  i know we have alot of air traffic and i see planes and helicopters day and night... i have never noticed anything like this before.  was odd.  i watched the light until it was gone.  lasted a total of maybe 2-3 minutes and that may be over estimated time.  it happened quick.
content.summary: Bright light moving in sky that was not a plan or star.

content.detailedDescription:
I was turning west and say what i thought was star in sky moving north to south. thought maybe it was moving because i was moving. stopped at intersection to observe and object stopped right after i did and remained stationary for 30 seconds as i did. then followed me north when i turned to go north. i checked inside my car to make sure my cell phone or something else was not ust reflecting on my window but there was nothing in car to do that. it followed me north and sped up ahead of me and then slowed down to get back even with me. it followed me for about a mile or two and then without changing trajectory it slowly faded out with the light looking like a dimmer switch being turned slowly off.
i noticed that it was the only star i saw in the sky when i was looking for traffic before i turned off of my street to go to exit of subdivision.
i thought is was a bright star when i first saw it. it was moving steadily from north to south with no flickering lights or lights other than white. it was moving very smoothly and rapidly and then just stopped without a studder right after i stopped to observe it. i thought oh my god. no star does that. i sat there for 30 seconds and then turned to continue on to work and it started to follow me. it looked to be several miles to the west of me but right in line with me to the left of my driver side window. it was abouve the trees about 300-500 feet i would guess.
when i was going over the bridge off iron bridge road at the lake the light started to slowly dim as if being turned down and then just disappeared.
this happended at 6:37am nov 2, 2011 and lasted about a minute or two.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like moved north to south hovered and followed me norht and then faded out

content.detailedDescription: Every morning, i wake up very early and drink some coffee and go out on my deck and ususally smoke a cigarette or two. i like to look at the stars and constellations ocassionally, especially when the the seasons change. this morning, i was looking up and saw two, dull white objects following each other. they were up very high, maybe even in outer space. they were identical, just a dull white glow. no blinking lights, just appeared round. the first round object caught my eye. it was round, like a dot. but at one time, it seemed to be unsteady for a second or so. the object behind it looked just like the first one, but was on a "mechanical driven" course behind it. what i mean was, it seemed driven to follow the other one. after these past thru the tree line i could not see them any longer. but these objects were in space, or the highest of earths space. i have never seen anything so strange before.
content.summary: Two white orbs following each other in sky.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking at the stars and a large craft was moving to the west and slowly changed direction to southwest. i could see it in the shape of a boomerang or chevron.I could not see the back shape of it, only by its illuminating outline i was able to see it. i was just thinking no way. it kind of looked like the bottom of the front of a boat. the outline had a red hue and looked almost like stars moving together, you could definitely tell it was some kind of craft. after it changed directions, it disappeared from sight, but slowly like it was going farther away not just disappeared. it was in the air very high. i am not sure what size it was but it was definitely large than a plane by like 20x. it looked like it was following a path of flight, as in, no sporadic movement.
content.summary: Large craft in the shape of a cheveron or boomerang over boise

content.detailedDescription: I was on my laptop watching tv, when i heard what sounded like a deep rumbling kind of noise.  i looked up and the tv picture was getting kind of static-y.  i went outside and the noise seemed quite loud.  it was a rumbling roar kind of noise.  i looked around for a while and didn't see anything.  i went back inside for a few minutes, and the noise didn't go away.  i decided to look for it again and saw a very large object.  i couldn't see any details, only the white light.  it was moving very slowly in a straight line.  it seemed like it couldn't have been that high up.  it went along for a while before moving out of sight over the trees.  i continued to hear the noise it emitted.  the total experience was about 10 minutes long.
content.summary: Very loud noises, very large lighted object

content.detailedDescription:
Unfortunately, i was very tired and not in great observing/remembering form when this incident occured.

i was a passenger in a car with 2 other people headed north on hwy 101 near leggett, ca around 1:30am. i noticed some lights through the windshield that somehow didn't look quite like airplanes usually do- it seemed to have more red/gold to it. the area we were driving through is forested with redwoods, has very rugged hills/mtns, and the road was very winding so it was difficult to keep the lights in view. there looked to be multiple colors (red, gold, whitish, and greenish or bluish) moving back and forth (or even rotating around) an object. in this regard, it was not that different from the way nav lights on a plane can sometimes look, but at this point it had become clear that it did not seem to have moved at all since i first saw it. as stated above, the area is mountainous, so i considered that it was someone's house atop a hill. it's a very rural area and the moon (just a sliver) had gone down a couple hours earlier (or behind the mtns anyway) so it was too dark for me to actually see the boundary between hill and sky. to me, it looked a bit too high to be the top of a hill, and then there was the fact that the lights were multi-colored and rotating (or whatever they were doing). however as it had been about 3min since i first observed the lights and they still hadn't seemed to move or change position/shape at all, i decided it must be someone's house on top of a very tall hill, having some sort of halloween disco party (hence the lights). i then lost sight of the lights and figured that was the end of that, but to my surprise, about ten minutes later, they appeared again. 

as we had covered some distance (traveling at about 65mph), it obviously could not have been a house on a hill, so i had the driver of the car stop so we could try to get a better look. the lights appeared to be at the same elevation as before, but perhaps were just a bit smaller, as if more distant. i couldn't really make out any other details about the lights. i tried to take a picture but my camera could not focus on distant lights in the dark. the lights then disappeared for a moment (behind tree or hill), thus confirming it wasn't a house, and then reappeared. a plane passed by to the west (the other lights being towards the north) and unlike the lights i was observing, it was very obviously a plane. the driver of the car felt that the "strange" lights i was seeing were just lights on another plane and the other passenger did not see the "strange" lights (or the plane). as it was cold and late, i gave up observing and got back in the car. as we were pulling back onto the highway, i noticed the lights seemed to be slightly more distant. i do think it's possible (even probable) that it was just a plane, that what i had seen 10min before was a completely different plane, and they just both happened to look strange to me and seemed to move very slowly (or perhaps not move at all)- perhaps becuz it was a cold and very clear night? almost as soon as we started driving again, i lost sight of the lights for good.
content.summary: Airplane-like lights seemed stationary

content.detailedDescription:
1. i am sleeping on my grand parents couch. there are 4 other adults asleep. i am 10 years old. suddenly i am sitting in my underwear on a curb across from a large field 4 blocks from the house. i wake up and sit stunned for probably 5-10 minutes suddenly a car drives by and honks nd i realize this is not a dream. i run home to find everyone outside looking for me for the past hour! the next morning strangely no one talks about the incident.
2. my parents and myself and 3 sisters are on our way to niagra falls ny family vacation. we` are only 20 miles from the falls at 930 at night-1030we are all very excited and wide awake! suddenly we are on a dirt road, a back road in a forest. we are all waking up and disoriented. my parents ask each other where are we and how did we get here? how do we find our way out of this place . it is now 2am! the next day no one speaks of this!
3. i am in canada at my grandparents cottage on lake erie. it is 1am and my friend gary and i are in twin beds talking away. suddenly he says that something not someone is in the room. i tell him i feel it too and that i am scared. the next thing we wake up as the son comes up and we do not discuss it for several days until i start to remember bits and peices...
4 one time i had a strange mark/burn on my stomach while at the drs i asked him to inspwect it. he looked and got another dr to take a look. he said , not smiling or laughing...It looks like another one of those alien abduction marks! i was stunned. he said that it was a burn and there was no way that i would not feel something that large n deep!
5. my mother was pregnant 9 times and on 4 pregnancies she just woke up no longer pregnat after supposedly reachuing the 4 th month. always in the 4th month no discharge or fetus just an empty womb..
content.summary: 5 separate missing time instances several with more than just myself 1 time entire family 6 people!

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went to the pa ufo bigfoot conference saturday, day.  that night we went on a halloween haunted hayride at bushy run battlfield.  our appointment was at 7:45 and we got there around 7:25.  we checked in, got some coco and waited for the hayride to start.  i was looking at all of the planes in the sky and noticed a white light coming from beyond the trees.  i thought it was a satellite.  it moved slowly then started darting and slowing, darting a slowing, and passed slightly over my head.  then it reversed direction of travel for a short distance and started to hover and kind of wobble, making very small circles and half circles.  i was mesmerized and my wife then asked me if i '"saw that".  i asked what she was referring to and she told me and it confirmed what i had seen.  the ticket taker told us to board the tractor and we didn't pay any attention to it furthur.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Went from horizon, passed overhead, came back and hovered

content.detailedDescription:
The reason my choices vary is because i have seen so much in the 12 years i lived in the sonora desert.  i was common place.  some like clock work.  like every thursday at 9 pm. we'd  see helicopters whar looked like they where escorting crafts out.  i suspect these are military experiments with alien craft.   those i grew used to and ignored.  i've had 3-4 amazing encounters. first one was an odd small  bright light with a  dimmer red light off next to it.  then while my ex and i were observing another white light appeared to the other side of the red light. then slowly one of the white lights went towards the red and disappeared. followed by the second white light doing the same. then the red light went poof!
     while driving home through the desert at night i seen an object very large what appeared to be very close less then 500 feet.  all i noticed at first was a dark silhouette against the sky!  i stopped to observe. then i i seen what i've seen dozens if not over 50. white lights appearing as  if either attached to the vessel or surrounding it,about 8 of them almost perfectly spaced. i tried to cal home but service was bad out there. to get home i had to enter a canyon for over a mile. i would lose site of the ufo. i also felt i was a sitting duck so went on my way.  when i came out it was gone.
     now this one was freaky, laying in my bed looking out a window over the mountain across from me. i seen 1 bright light just hanging there. very odd. then from the center out it went to 3 then 5! i rolled over my ex and yelled, look at that ! i went outside. now it went back from 5 to 3 then 1. i still see faint lights on the outer 2 and 3.  i go back in and get my 8x binoculars.  now  all 3 lights are moving towards me.  the mountain across from me is maybe 600 yards. as they approach where i'm standing one light veers off right. the next veers left, then circles wide around and appeared to be a very slow moving military jet?  i say this because after it got around my mountain it was headed towards luke air force base and was flashing lights which is wasn't before.  now the center light is coming straight over head.  it was not a jet roar, or the humming as i have heard others state. it was more a low rumbling moving very very slow. i was thinking what is keeping this thing in flight moving so slow.  when i say slow i'm guessing 20 mph?   it was like slow motion.  the bottom looked  like a scene from close encounters. thousands of lights. i seen no wings it was more roundish but massive.  
      my family living there and guests and others have witnessed these events time and time again. the most common was the object with the lights appearing around the outside.
     also some daytime sightings which we believed where drones. erratic flying dropping rapid movements.  
  your form sucks for information. the witnesses ranged from 1 to 8 over the 12 years
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple events impossible to describe in 25 words

content.detailedDescription: One orb light was seen then two then a third and fourth. one was far too bright to be a star. it stayed high above. while watching after about 15 minutes an airplane was seen coming toward the objects. also a green orb lit a nearby residence. it was very bright than dimmed got bright again and almost went out before it brightened again than turned orange and all the strange light ceased. three of the of four were orb like and seemed to glow. they went from south to north in what looked like the linden area. the fourth one was more directly overhead and it was intensely bright, unlike any star ever seen.
content.summary: One orb light was seen then two then a third and fourth. one was far too bright to be a star. a green orb lit a nearby residence, it dimmed, brightened than turned orange and went away.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were driving back from olathe a little after 9 pm, on 435, going north. it was between 87th and 95th street exit ramps, when i spotted a bright, low star-like object. i mentioned it to him, and he looked out the window. at first we thought it might be a planet, but it was larger than a planet, was much closer, and very bright. it looked like it was lower than where the cloud level would be, so we then thought it may be a plane or helicopter, but it made no noise and wasn't moving in any direction. after a few minutes of looking straight at this, i noticed a faint red light, just slightly flickering on it. 

we looked at it all the way home.. which was a good 10 minutes or so, and it eventually dimmed to where we could no longer see it.
content.summary: Unknown, large, star-like object hovering

content.detailedDescription: Heard a strange humming sound in the sky south of where our kids were trick or treating. i managed to take 1 clear picture as it was out of our view in seconds.
content.summary: Disc shaped object in spring hill, southern direction, seven hills

content.detailedDescription:
Reno nv 08/2011

a co-worker and i were sitting in front of our place of work in the middle of the day. there were no clouds in the sky. at that point, i noticed what appeared to be a bright star that was completely stationary at a very high altitude.I didnt think much of it until i saw how fast it moved. it went from perfectly still, to shooting across the sky at a speed so fast, my eyes could barely keep up with it. as fast as it took off, it stopped just as quick. (around 40 seconds of watching it) i told my friend that i was with to watch it with me. he and i watched it as it was stationary for 30 seconds or so, then it took off again moving at an un-real rate! then it seemed to stop and move in almost a star-like pattern. it almost looked as if it was playing with the sky. it left no trail, made no noise, and didnt blink. it was a solid light that was white/gold. at one point it did seem to change shape from a sphere, to a diamond. the size of the object was like looking at a pencil eraser from 4 feet away. it was hard to really tell the exact shape because it appeared to be very high. it was like watching someone playing with a cat laser toy shining against a wall to see how fast they could make it move. but when it stopped, it did not shake. 
we watched it move, stop, move, stop for around 2 minutes or so, then it took off south. very,very fast and we never saw it again. we sat there looking for it again trying to figure out what we had seen and to this day, neither of us have any idea. i do know one thing, no person could have survived that sort of movement.
content.summary: Rapidly moving white/gold light.

content.detailedDescription: On 10/26/11 i was standing on a roof and a silver object caught my eye. silver with a black band near / around the center, and as high as it was i thought that could be the wing that i couldn't see clearly, and no contrail at all. as i watched i noticed a passenger jet approaching following the curvature of the earth with contrails streaming, giving it the appearance of climbing....To a point, so i figured i could now judge how high the silver object was. this silver object was travelling much faster that the jet approaching each other, it would seem due to the speed difference that the silver object was lower...But when the flight paths intersected the jet was under the object because i could still see 2/3rds of the silver object and all of the jet. so as i'm throwing out expletives of amazement i noticed that the silver object was not getting lower in the sky...It was going higher, it went up and out, not the downward following the curvature as did the jet. the time was 3:31 pm, i went to an aviation map for real-time tracking, went to replay the flights over orange county, n.Y. and it wouldn't do the replay for that time of day, and it was travelling north to south , the jet was south to north.
content.summary: Silver cigar with black band no contrail, higher than jet with contrail, object passed over the jet, could still see object, jet didn't block all of object

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside on my driveway with the outside flood lights on, talking on the phone with a friend in california and suddenly saw a bright white light fly over the treeline coming from the north. i told my friend she would never believe what i was watching and described it to her as it continued to fly towards me until it got straight overhead and then somewhat gradually turned towards the east southeast and continued on that path until it flew out of sight over the horizon. it was bright like the appearance of a star, and only about 500 feet overhead. it was so bright that i could not make out any shape to it other than a basically spherical shape as a star would look. it did not make a sound, and appeared to almost be made of light as opposed to having lights on it. i know almost as much about physics as anyone on earth, and knew that what i was watching was supposed to be impossible. almost as soon as i saw it i thought to run inside and get my video camera but remembered that the battery was dead as luck would have it...There is no doubt in my mind that if the battery had not been dead the world would have definitive proof of the existence of ufo's that are not man made. although it seemed to possibly be made of light, it did not light up the area as i would think something like that would to have been flying so close to the ground. i also realized that since it changed its flight path, it had to have been controlled by some form of intelligence. took me weeks to wrap my head around what i had seen because the physics of such a craft should be impossible. i tried to identify it as anything i could possibly dismiss it as man made, but even after weeks of thinking about any type of physical laws that could make such a craft man made, i was left with the obvious conclusion that it was not. this was a very difficult realization for me because although i had always kept an open mind about ufo's, i did not believe it was possible for them to visit earth because the physics of such long distance space travel should be impossible. i even talked to retired air force pilots who could not explain it, although they told me of rumors of pilots seeing such things that i now know have been referred to as foo fighters. now this is where my testimony gets hard to believe for anyone other than those ppl who have been with me and seen these objects. since '07, i and whoever has been with me at such times have seen around 75 ufo's that cannot be explained as satellites, shooting stars, or anything but what they are. after my sighting in '07 i started watching the night sky frequently but did not see anything else until spring of '08. since then, my parents girlfriend, her son, my aunt, and i have no idea how many other ppl in this area have seen similar ufo's usually from spring until around the 4th of july, except this summer we have seen a few later than the 4th. none have been as close as the first one i saw, but i have videoed several that came close enough to video in the spring and summer of '08. i have also found that if a high powered spot light, or usually a high powered green laser are shinned at the crafts, they will sometimes light up about 75 percent brighter than before a light is shinned at them. usually they will light up somewhere suddenly, fly a distance and then dim out to nothing. we have also seen them fly at varying speeds, sometimes so fast they travel great distances vs they're altitude in a matter of seconds. we have even seen them suddenly accelerate to speeds so fast that they leave a light trail and then disappear. my mom and i watched one fly over they're house at an altitude of about 800 feet curving almost the entire path and then disappear. i have seen some that pulseate, slowly going from dim to bright and back and forth. we have also seen many in blairsville ga, and one brilliant one just last saturday night in jasper co ga where i own some timber land, and get this....I have a strange photo of something that seems to be greyish green with black eyes that seemed to be inspecting a trail camera that i use to get pictures of deer on my land in jasper co. it moved so fast when the camera took the picture though that it was just a blur, so the picture is inconclusive, but i cannot understand what else it could be but what it looks like. i have searched the net since '08 trying to find some reputable source to report all this to, but this is the first site i have found that i think might be capable of actually finding some answers to all this. i called one ufo group one time and told the guy that if someone would just spend about a week here in the spring that i could prove to them or anyone that ufo's exist and i could show anyone things that should be impossible flying over the area, but he did not believe me and said i needed to write a report and send it in. that's rather frustrating when you can show someone ufo's in the night sky but they won't take the time to come see them. why should i report something that they would not come see in person i figured? lol granted the window of opportunity is not what it was in '07-'10, because we have not seen very many this past summer which is appalling to me that i could not find one single group dedicated to proving these things instead of just making money off the speculation about them. i have a few theories about these things, but nothing i can still satisfy myself with, and things i can't understand almost drive me crazy...Lol i've never seen anything until '07 or encountered anything i could not figure out if i set my mind to it, and now i have seen things i can't explain and have no way of finding out more about them. anyway, i will be more than happy to do anything to help find answers cause i want to know what they are in the worst way now...There's a big difference in even believing something exists and knowing for sure....
also, i don't know how to upload my videos or anything else right now, but will be happy to send a copy of them by mail or something if i need to. thanks...
content.summary: Came frm north, flew till straight overhead, gradually turned east southeast and flew out of sight over horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in the back yeard
i belive it was a star, but then,i was too big to be a star.
then it saw me,and came around the trees to see me.
then i keap thinking i hope it will not hert me.
like i said,i did not want anything to do with that thing.
and i want inside the house
sorry about my spilling.
content.summary: I fear for my safty, i went back inside the house.

content.detailedDescription:
October 14 th at approximately 8 pm went outdoors to take photos of the orbs & ufos which i've noticed through the window . upon taking the photos with a flash on the lightships really power up with a huge surge of light coming from them which makes them appear on photos really well . at this point when i click on the camera in sequence i'm able to see whether the ships come much closer & or which direction they fly to or if they hover in the area . it's quiet spectacular to witness these sightings ! 
after taking several photos , i've thank them telepathically & went indoors to review the images . 
i'm attaching 1 zoomed in image of 1 of the magnificent looking crafts in which the structure can be seen . this photo is already included in a video on yt titled : ufo / ovni lightships in the sky continues :)  if anyone's interested at mufon in seeing more of all the photographs then please access it there .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright ufos continue to appear over toronto .
